mdx.rawBody:
---
status: public
shortDescription: "A class with a recursive method represents part of a recursive data structure"
shortCorrection: "A class having a recursive method does not imply that it is part of a recursive data structure"
concepts:
  - Recursion
  - Method
  - Type
related:
  # - id: LiteralNoExpression
  #   relation: Special case
inOtherPl:
  # - pl: Java
  #   id: NoAtomicExpression
  # - pl: Python
  #   id: NoAtomicExpression
spec:
  - id: jls21
    sections: ["15.2", "8.4", "8.1", "8.3"]
plVersion:
  # from: ecma6
  # to: ecma11
---

If a class `C` contains a recursive method `m()`,
then class `C` is part of a recursive data structure.

frontmatter.shortDescription: A class with a recursive method represents part of a recursive data structure
frontmatter.shortCorrection: A class having a recursive method does not imply that it is part of a recursive data structure
